name: Gingey's Revenge!
description:
I decided to give myself the challenge of making a Christmas themed game within 3 hours on Christmas day :) I made a clicker game where you try to fend off evil gingerbread men from stealing your Christmas gifts as you open them.

We'll just say those last few minutes were intense. With such a limited timeframe, I learned it's important to focus on the essentials, and to not get too fancy. Now keep in mind, the game is a bit buggy, but hopefully you enjoy it nonetheless!
